page.title: 16Makentie Chicken Factory.
page.content: The chicken factory is situated at G.R. 0347904106. It has produced poultry for 23 years and was started by Mr Entwistle, then the factory was taken over by Makentie in 1977. Mr Entwistle sold eggs then sold fresh chickens. The chickens are brought in from {Dove Valley} Chickens in Derbyshire. Each day a van brings 2000 chickens, they are dead,plucked & cleaned when they arrive. Eight people work there and they tie the chickens up and steam cook them and add colour to give them a better look. They work for 5 days a week so cook {8-9 thousand chickens per week.}They also deal with turkeys,ducks & geese according to demand.{Markets} are supermarkets,chip shops & butchers in Flint,Liverpool,Birmingham & Preston. There is hope for expansion.
